entry.string: xarbb provides basic forum functions provided mainly from Xaraya utility modules. The forum itself is very light weight, but designed to handle large volume postings.
entry.translation: xerbb prufeedes beseec furoom fooncshuns prufeeded meeenly frum Xereya uteelity mudooles. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Zee furoom itselff is fery leeght veeeght, boot deseegned tu hundle-a lerge-a fuloome-a pusteengs.

entry.string: From the menu, you have three choices. "Modify Configuration", "Add Forums", and "View Forums".
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a three-a chueeces. Um gesh dee bork, bork! "Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun", "Edd Furooms", und "Feeoo Furooms".

entry.string: Modify Configuration -- Allows you to set certain configuration routines for forums.
entry.translation: Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun -- Elloos yuoo tu set certeeen cunffeegooreshun ruooteenes fur furooms.

entry.string: View Forums -- Allows you to view the forums that you have configured on your system.
entry.translation: Feeoo Furooms -- Elloos yuoo tu feeoo zee furooms thet yuoo hefe-a cunffeegoored oon yuoor system.

entry.string: Add Forums -- Allows you to add new forums to your system.
entry.translation: Edd Furooms -- Elloos yuoo tu edd noo furooms tu yuoor system.

entry.string: There is currently one block provided called Latest Posts. If the block is not showing as an option when adding a Block instance it may not have been registered. In this case please add the block type through Admin Blocks-Add Block Type
entry.translation: Zeere-a is coorrently oone-a bluck prufeeded celled Letest Pusts. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Iff zee bluck is nut shooeeng es un oopshun vhee eddeeng a Bluck instunce-a it mey nut hefe-a beee regeestered. Bork bork bork! In thees cese-a pleese-a edd zee bluck type-a thruoogh Edmeen Blucks-Edd Bluck Type
